prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with vibrant orange and white patterns reminiscent of ocean waves.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a fish, featuring elegant fins and a striking horn.
Generate a design for a quirky aquatic Pokemon that brings joy and excitement to battles.
Make a Pokemon that has a round body, large fins, and a playful expression, perfect for trainers.
Imagine a fish Pokemon that thrives in underwater environments while exhibiting strong combat skills.
Design a Pokemon that can gracefully glide through water with a colorful body and unique features.
Give me an aquatic creature with a bright color palette that showcases both beauty and strength.
